subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: A 4-0 loss in Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals has Pittsburgh trailing in a series for the first time this postseason, and Penguins Coach Michel Therrien is looking to shake things up. He switched his lines for practice, dropping Pascal Dupuis from Sidney Crosby’s line and replacing him with Ryan Malone. For Detroit, Johan Franzen moved a step closer to making his return from a concussion, practicing on Sunday.
